title: Multiple Salinity Tests Data Schema
description: A measurement of electrical properties commonly called CoCw. This is one measurement of clay conductivity. This captures the conductivity of a water-saturated sample (Co), and a conductivity of simulated brines (Cw). The experiment is done using multiple salinities of water.

TestMethodID.title: Test Method ID
TestMethodID.description: The method used to perform the analysis on this sample.

SalinityTestResults.title: Salinity Test Results
SalinityTestResults.description: Summary of results from salinity testing, including various measurements and calculated factors related to salinity.

items.title: Salinity Test Results
items.description: Summary of results from salinity testing, including various measurements and calculated factors related to salinity.

SampleID.title: Sample ID
SampleID.description: The OSDU Identifier for the Sample associated with this analysis.

BQv.title: BQv
BQv.description: The quantity of brine used in the test, representing the volume or concentration of brine related to the salinity measurements.

Qv.title: Qv
Qv.description: The volume of fluid (brine or other) used in the test.

BrineResistivity.title: Brine Resistivity
BrineResistivity.description: The resistivity of the brine sample, which provides information about the ionic content and salinity of the brine.

AdjustedFormationResistivityFactor.title: Adjusted Formation Resistivity Factor
AdjustedFormationResistivityFactor.description: The formation resistivity factor adjusted for the brine salinity, used in interpreting resistivity logs and fluid saturation.

AdjustedSaturationExponent.title: Adjusted Saturation Exponent
AdjustedSaturationExponent.description: The saturation exponent adjusted for salinity effects, used to improve the accuracy of fluid saturation calculations.

WaterSaturationOverResistivity.title: Water Saturation Over Resistivity
WaterSaturationOverResistivity.description: Data on water saturation calculated from resistivity measurements, used to determine fluid content in the formation.

items.title: Water Saturation Over Resistivity
items.description: Data on water saturation calculated from resistivity measurements, used to determine fluid content in the formation.

ResistivityIndex.title: Resistivity Index
ResistivityIndex.description: The index of resistivity used to relate resistivity measurements to water saturation in the formation.

WaterSaturation.title: Water Saturation
WaterSaturation.description: The calculated water saturation of the formation, derived from resistivity data, indicating the proportion of pore space occupied by water.

SalinityTestSteps.title: Salinity Test Steps
SalinityTestSteps.description: Details of each step in the salinity testing process, including specific measurements and conditions during the test.

items.title: Salinity Test Steps
items.description: Details of each step in the salinity testing process, including specific measurements and conditions during the test.

BrineSalinity.title: Brine Salinity
BrineSalinity.description: The concentration of salt in the brine at a specific step of the test, affecting resistivity and other salinity-related calculations.

BrineConductivity.title: Brine Conductivity
BrineConductivity.description: The electrical conductivity of the brine at a specific step, which is inversely related to resistivity and indicative of ion concentration.

CoreConductivity.title: Core Conductivity
CoreConductivity.description: The conductivity of the core sample at a specific step, used to assess the effect of brine salinity on the coreâ€™s electrical properties.
